.. _tutorial:

Tutorial
========

The following tutorial walks you through the process of using ``platos_closet``. The main goal of this package is to 
tell if a planet of the solar sytem can create a transit signal strong enough to be detected by `PLATO space mission <https://platomission.com/>`_.
